title: Notice for smartwatch
summary: Let iPhone/iPad notification center message show on Android Wear smartwatch
developerAddress: No.22, Aly. 22, Ln. 335, Xiangnan Rd., Dongshan Township, Yilan County 269, Taiwan (R.O.C.)

You need install "Notice for smartwatch" on your iPhone/iPad.Feature:. Smartwatch can connect to iPhone and Android Phone together.You can download app from Google Play at anytime. descriptionHTML:
Notice for smartwatch design for your Android Wear smartwatch. It let your smartwatch can receive notice message from iPhone/iPad Notification center. You need install "Notice for smartwatch" on your iPhone/iPad.

Feature:
. Smartwatch can connect to iPhone and Android Phone together.
You can download app from Google Play at anytime. And, receive message from iPhone/iPad or Android phone.

. Support Notification Actions
. You can "Answer or Decline a incoming call" from your watch.
. You can "Dial-back or Clear a missed call" from your watch.
. You can "Clear any message" from watch if you had read it.

. Support blocked list
You can easy filter out not important app's message.
. support Anti Lose, help to protect your smartwatch or iOS device.
. support Find iOS device (from smartwatch)
. support Find my watch (from iPhone)


System requirement:
iPhone/iPad require iOS 8.0 or later
Android Wear smartwatch require Android Wear 5.1 or later
Android Phone require Android 4.4.2 or later
comments: Couldnt connect Couldnt connect with my fossil q marshall smartwatch.  Stuck at "searching.... " I want a refund for both android and apple app
I hate iPhones, but when forced to use one this little app becomes quite handy. Especially if you also use an Android tablet.
